comment: To be fair, the material itself wasn't the most interesting so after taking that into consideration this class wasn't all that bad! The notes are straight from the book so attendance isn't mandatory but it was helpful because he will answer questions and class discussions were interesting. Study occasionally and you'll do fine!
His power points are exactly from the book. Didn't like how the assignments were grades based off of his opinion ranther than fact. Exams are difficult but the finals are the exams combined.
He's good, just study his test follow the same format every single time. Ask him questions he'll help you out !
Great professor! He knows his stuff and is always willing to help out! He's entertaining and very funny! The class wasn't too hard; just study! And he's very good looking! :)

Awesome psych professor. He is funny and sarcastic, which is great. If you ever need help with anything he is more than happy to help you and will actually make sure you understand the material. He is definitely one of my favorite professors! I dreaded research methods before his class but he made the class enjoyable. Oh and he is adorable! (:

I am only not happy because I did not receive the grade I expected but this is a hard class anyways so it was not his fault. His class was fun, he was really up to date with new research in the field and that kept the class interesting he's not hard to look at either. I would take him again.
Professor Harrison was great. He was very helpful at all times and was interested in what he was teaching. Funny guy, but you have to do the work. I would def take him again!!

New professor. cute guy, nice guy, but he absolutely sucks as a professor especially a psychology professor. this guy just presents power-point presentations straight from the book. this is the most boring class EVERR he has missed the concept of educating. in order to educate you must teach, not lecture the book to us
